verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The day of resurrection! Earth, tell it out abroad; the Passover of gladness, the Passover of God. From death to life eternal, from this world to the sky, our Christ hath brought us over, with hymns of victory.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Our hearts be pure from evil, that we may see aright the Lord in rays eternal of resurrection light; and, list'ning to His accents, may hear, so calm and plain, His own "All hail!" and, hearing, may raise the victor strain.

verse.name: v3
